name: BigSeller Product Scraper
summary: E-commerce product scraping tool that XHR/fetch monkey-patches 20+ marketplace sites (Shopee, Lazada, TikTok Shop, Taobao, 1688, AliExpress, Facebook Marketplace). Intercepts Shopee anti-fraud headers (af-ac-enc-dat) via webRequest.onBeforeSendHeaders. Enumerates ALL window global objects on every page navigation and sends via postMessage('*'). Suppresses Taobao/Tmall anti-bot CAPTCHAs. Broad host_permissions to all URLs with proxyRequest handler enabling arbitrary cross-origin requests.

vulnerabilities.title: XHR/Fetch Response Interception on 20+ Marketplaces
vulnerabilities.description: Replaces window.XMLHttpRequest with proxy class and wraps window.fetch on targeted marketplace pages to intercept all API responses, even when not actively scraping.

vulnerabilities.title: Shopee Anti-Fraud Header Interception
vulnerabilities.description: Captures Shopee af-ac-enc-dat anti-bot encryption token via webRequest.onBeforeSendHeaders to bypass bot detection.

vulnerabilities.title: Window Global Object Enumeration
vulnerabilities.description: Enumerates ALL keys on window object on every page load, serializes all plain objects found, and sends via postMessage('*').

flags.description: Replaces XMLHttpRequest prototype on 20+ marketplace sites to intercept all API responses continuously
Wraps window.fetch on Shopee to intercept product detail API responses
Intercepted product data, Shopee anti-fraud tokens, and window globals forwarded to bigseller.com
